name: NSPopUpButton.ArrowPosition
desc: These constants are defined for use with the arrowPosition property.

items.name: case noArrow
items.desc: Does not display any arrow in the control.

items.name: case arrowAtCenter
items.desc: Arrow is centered vertically, pointing toward the preferredEdge.

items.name: case arrowAtBottom
items.desc: Arrow is drawn at the edge of the button, pointing toward the preferredEdge.
